info.name: vaccines-monitor-samad-fsnd
info.description:
This is the API Documentation and Tests for the Vaccines Monitor application, created for the Udacity Full-Stack course.

Note, the ordering of the documentation below is based on the ordering of the chaining of tests (i.e. create -> update ->  check -> delete).

The live application is hosted at: 
https://vaccines-monitor-samad-fsnd.herokuapp.com/
Check that this home webpage returns "Service is running." before doing any curl requests.

Note: all username and passwords are stored in this collection's variables, so when running the test, it will automatically fetch JWTs and apply them in the curl commands as token headers. If you need to manually see the token for a particular user, go to one of the tests of that user folder (eg 'doctor'), run the first test in that folder, then open the environment variables and see `currentAccessToken`.

item.name: doctor
Read the patient with no tests
Add vaccine A to the patient
Add vaccine B to the patient
Read the patient with both vaccines
Test A is also automatically deleted
Test B is also automatically deleted
